nodes.bodyText: Can we have some generic comments so that lazy people that just use override will inherit and are good enough?
Can you please leave these todos? Or create issue if you want.
Please add javadoc about what <T> is here.
What's the rationale behind having normalize on both the naming convention enum and the ConfigBuilder itself?
What happened to these default values? Doing a quick pass, I don't see them anywhere and don't know whether they exist anymore in this PR.
